document.full_text: ac/dc fans will learn a lot more about frontman brian johnson's relationships with cars and auto racing than with music and the band in his new book, "rockers and rollers: a full-throttle memoir."
document.title: ac/dc singer driven to write about cars in memoir
lines_and_colors: ac/dc fans will learn a lot more about frontman brian johnson's relationships with cars and auto racing than with music and the band in his new book, "rockers and rollers: a full-throttle memoir."
